symphony.domain

Class Season

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Concert>
          • symphony.domain.Season
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Concert>, java.util.Collection<Concert>, java.util.List<Concert>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class Season
extends java.util.ArrayList<Concert>
    The season class represents a season that has scheduled a number of concerts.
    See Also:
